name: reLoading (Zo_Juan_00)
description:
This is my first attempt at creating a game and It was not a walk in the park.! In just a single week this is what I was able to accomplish...and im really proud of it

I wish to improve on this project as much as it takes to fullfill my intended outcome of a rogue-like adventure themed game with a classic 50's style.

This game will implement many new features like a companion pickup mechanic that will use the newly found friends to dynamically change each player's overall experience whether thats through 'stat increases' or a new mobility feature. The options are endless!
